messages.placeholder: (waiting to check the status; click the Check Status button to check immediately)
messages.upToDate: the catalog is up to date. Feel free to start using the examples.
messages.behund: there are important updates for the demos in the upstream repository. You should use the Refresh button below to get the most recent examples.
messages.ahead: it seems that you have started your own version control. If you ever want to revert your changes and start fresh, use the Refresh button below.
messages.unable: unable to determine status due to a server-side error.

refresh.foreword: Did the status check report that there are important updates to the demos? Do you want to undo all your changes to the demos and start fresh? Use the button below in both cases. It will wipe the demo directory and pull the latest code of the demos from GitHub. You will lose any changes you have made to the demos and any data that your demo runs may have generated.
